credit_line: Gift of The Jack Denst Designs, Inc.
dimensions: Overall: 1524 x 76.2 cm (50 ft. x 30 in.)
title: Alimony
description: Design of U.S. currency in very large-scale.  The bills are stacked one on top of another in two columns. Some bills show the front and some show the reverse. The bills are printed in green and brown on a Mylar foil ground.
name: Sidewall
